attributes.action: arrange for the return of hit '80s TV show 'ALF' to UK television with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'ALF' was the finest TV series of the 80s. So why isn't it available on UK television? At all? There are about -2,672 tv channels showing utter rubbish in this country and we demand that ALF, the furry TV sensation is brought back immediately!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
